title: Collaborative Reflection-Based Mathematics Teacher Professional Transformation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematics Pedagogy and Curriculum Design Knowledge
context.additional_context: Design and implementation of collaborative classroom environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can collaboratively develop four or more mathematics lesson plans based on Understanding by Design (UbD) principles
Participants can identify and propose improvements for at least 80% of issues observed during lesson implementation through reflective meetings with peers and coaches
Learners can analyze student comprehension data using digital tools and implement revised lesson designs at least three times based on findings

resources: Digital content library for math education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
